briefdescription.para: Dynamically allocates or reallocates memory for directory entries.

detaileddescription.para: This function manages the memory for the array of FileCardInfo structures. It starts with INITIAL_ENTRIES and doubles the size when more space is needed.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the array of FileCardInfo structures.
Pointer to the current size of the array.

briefdescription.para: Processes directory entries and populates the entries array.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads directory contents, creates FileCardInfo structures for each entry, and dynamically allocates memory as needed. It also integrates Git status information.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the directory to process.
Pointer to the array of FileCardInfo structures.
Pointer to the number of entries processed.
Pointer to the current size of the entries array.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char **patterns, int pattern_count, FileCardInfo **entries, int *num_entries, int *current_size)
memberdef.name: process_files_or_patterns

briefdescription.para: Processes files or patterns and populates the entries array.

detaileddescription.para: This function handles file patterns (including globs) and individual files, creating FileCardInfo structures for matching entries.

parameterdescription.para: Array of file patterns or names to process.
Number of patterns in the array.
Pointer to the array of FileCardInfo structures.
Pointer to the number of entries processed.
Pointer to the current size of the entries array.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a given path is a directory.

parameterdescription.para: The path to check.

simplesect.para: 1 if the path is a directory, 0 otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Processes a single target (directory, file, or pattern).

detaileddescription.para: This function handles different types of targets: directories, glob patterns, and individual files. It populates the entries array accordingly.

parameterdescription.para: The target to process (directory path, file path, or pattern).
Pointer to the array of FileCardInfo structures.
Pointer to the number of entries processed.
Pointer to the current size of the entries array.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the targets are glob patterns or specific files.

detaileddescription.para: This function determines whether the given targets include glob patterns or specific files, as opposed to just directories.

parameterdescription.para: Array of target strings.
Number of targets in the array.

simplesect.para: 1 if glob patterns or specific files are present, 0 otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Main function of the facad program.

detaileddescription.para: This function serves as the entry point for the facad directory listing tool. It parses command-line arguments, processes directories or files based on the input, and displays the results using the appropriate format (standard, long listing, or analytics).

parameterdescription.para: Number of command-line arguments.
Array of command-line argument strings.

simplesect.para: EXIT_SUCCESS on successful execution, EXIT_FAILURE on error.

briefdescription.para: Main entry point for the facad directory listing tool.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the main function and core logic for the facad tool, which provides a colorful and feature-rich directory listing in the terminal. It handles command-line arguments, processes directories or files, and displays the results using various output formats.
